title: Colts Owner Defends Jeff Saturday’s Hire as Coach
description: Jeff Saturday, most recently an ESPN analyst, was tabbed as the team’s interim head coach, having coached only high school football.
dc:creator: Victor Mather and Emmanuel Morgan
media:description: Jeff Saturday, a former center for the Colts, was named interim coach of the team on Monday. His coaching experience is only at the high school level — at Hebron Christian Academy, a high school in Dacula, Ga., where his record was 20-16.
